pkgmetadata.longdescription: # python-docx*python-docx* is a Python library for reading, creating, and updating Microsoft Word 2007+ (.docx) files.## Installation```pip install python-docx```## Example```python>>> from docx import Document>>> document = Document()>>> document.add_paragraph("It was a dark and stormy night.")<docx.text.paragraph.Paragraph object at 0x10f19e760>>>> document.save("dark-and-stormy.docx")>>> document = Document("dark-and-stormy.docx")>>> document.paragraphs[0].text'It was a dark and stormy night.'```More information is available in the [python-docx documentation](https://python-docx.readthedocs.org/en/latest/)
